messages.content: Oh, I see what you did... Trying to confuse me.
Are you saying the ones who suffer most are billionaire psychopaths? I’m confused by the wording.
Generally you are still a “teacher” but I’m not sure 100%. I know my instructional coach role is still “teacher” contract/pay.
Same here. I just don't understand how NOBODY at Lucasfilm said during the production, "Hey maybe this is a bad idea."
Crippling? How so? It’s with Fox Sports right? I figured they probably had a good deal with them, but maybe not.
I think in 1.0 it's a lot harder to SDI out of Fox's dair, but I forget why
Idk why you got downvoted but heres an upvote
We finally lost a game while I was shuffling my tarot deck and now I can’t decide if I should try again or if the luck ran out
Why am I seeing this everywhere now? This wasn't in my vocabulary last week.
What's that like? Like what's the thought process? I dunno. I know what's a weird question..i just can't imagine
Some aren't. Either way it's a mystery how they obrained so many M1s.
